snippet: A Federal Reserve report to Congress says Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac could help end the chill in the housing market by worrying less about their own short-term financial condition.
abstract: A Federal Reserve report to Congress says Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac could help end the chill in the housing market by worrying less about their own short-term financial condition.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve tried Wednesday to stir interest among policy makers in the problems afflicting the housing market, sending a white paper to Congress outlining suggestions for easing those problems.

headline.main: The Fed's Advice on the Housing Crisis
